Adam Wentz

I'm a Backend Engineer at Dollar Shave Club. Formerly of The Onion & ClickHole.

Some Personal Projects

Machine learning

  • Neural image analogies

    Uses a deep neural network (VGG16) to generate image analogies. Article from Prosthetic Knowledge

  • Deep ASCII

    Uses a deep neural network (VGG16) to generate ASCII art.

  • Real-time style transfer using Keras

    An implementation of "Real-time Style Transfer" using the Keras framework.

Web apps

  • gif hell

    New and trending gifs on twitter. Media: The Atlantic, NBC News, TheVerge.com

  • Internet Peso

    "Digital currency for humans." A joke cybercurrency. Written in Django but has classy .aspx URLs. Generates printable notes with QR codes for transferring funds offline.

  • StereoSelfie

    Capture a pair of images which, when viewed together, produce a 3D effect. Uses your webcam and computer vision techniques to estimate the distance between pictures. Github

No longer up

  • DoppelChat

    Anonymous peer-to-peer chatroom where the conversation threads are clustered by image similarity. Uses WebRTC for P2P and convnetjs for computing feature vectors via a convolutional neural network. UI is React with material-ui.

  • Oldstagramme

    "Take pictures which take time to take." An online daguerreotype simulator. BuzzFeed write-up

Games

  • Glorious Golfer

    Classic golf video game written with HaxeFlixel. Presented by DPRK Studios.

    "...may be the most ridiculous game ever made." - The Daily Mirror
    "...a realistic simulation...The game is pretty..." - Golf Digest

  • Glorious Defender

    Pong/Missile Defender hybrid written with HaxeFlixel. Presented by DPRK Studios.

  • DMZ Dash

    Infinite runner game written with HaxeFlixel. Presented by DPRK Studios.

  • Parkour Vigilante

    A one-joke game in the style of LCD handhelds.

  • H.P. Lovecraft Teaches Typing

    An HTML5 typing game. Made with the Phaser game engine.

  • Badges of Honor

    A satire of the modern first-person shooter.

  • Shingy Bird

    An HTML5 "flappy bird" clone starring AOL's Digital Prophet, Shingy. Made with the Phaser game engine.

Twitter

  • lol/s

    A twitter bot which counts the occurence of "lol" in tweets, emits graphs, and additionally shows the tweets which are most replied to with lol. Here's a gevent-based framework I made for this sort of thing.

BuzzFeed upgrades

  • ButtFeet

    BuzzFeed but with slightly different text and images. Uses Varnish, uWSGI, and BeautifulSoup.

  • BzzzFeee

    Turns entire BuzzFeed articles into easy-to-consume .gifs.

Hubot

  • hubot-drudgesiren

    Hubot script which alerts a room when siren.gif appears on drudgereport.com.

  • hubot-rapture

    Hubot script which can report the current rapture index.

Utilities

  • Coolmit

    A custom command for git which allows you to "mine" commit hashes with custom prefixes.

Tutorial

  • How To Make Animated Human Sprites

    A description of an open-source animated humanoid sprite pipeline.
